name: Win Condition
_source: s;Vincent;So, Luther, how do you feel?
s;Luther;...{w}{br}I feel...{w} powerful again.{w}{br}I finally felt that spark of fighting spirit,{w} that sense of being unstoppable.
s;Simon;Thanks to you, the land is free from giants once more.
s;Luther;I just can't believe one had gotten away before...
s;Vincent;Hey, you can't be perfect all the time.{w}{br}Even when you're a living legend, the Fates have a way of making life difficult.
s;Simon;And we've had enough difficulty to last awhile.{w}{br}But at the same time, I don't see our lives getting easier anytime soon.
s;Luther;Aye, but Vincent and I will support you.
s;Luther;Thank you for supporting me here.{w}{br}I shouldn't have put my own legacy above the group's safety.{w}{br}I just...{w} didn't want to fail again.
s;Simon;We killed the giant, though.{w} We have what it takes.{w}{br}It might be gradual, but we've had a lot of victories recently.
s;Simon;At this rate, we'll take back our home in no time.
